title: Pure vs Impure pipe Performance
desc: Pure pipes are executed only when a 'PURE CHANGE' to the input value is detected. A pure change is either a change to a primitive input (string, number etc) value. or changed Object reference. By default a pipe is pure pipe. Impure pipe executes every time irrespective of source has changed or not. which leads to bad performance.
